text: 2027 (MMXXVII) will be a common year starting on Friday in the Gregorian calendar, the 2027th year of the Common Era (CE) and Anno Domini (AD) designations, . == Predicted and scheduled events == === May === * May 15: 100th anniversary of the Hollywood Roosevelt Hotel. * May 18: 100th anniversary of the Grauman's Chinese Theatre. * May 25: 50th anniversary of the Star Wars. === August === * August 7 - Asteroid will pass within 388,960 km (0.0026 AU) of the Earth. === Date unknown === * October-November - 2027 Cricket World Cup. * In Japan, JR Central will start operating the Chūō Shinkansen between Shinagawa Station (Tokyo) and Nagoya Station (Nagoya) by Maglev system (JR–Maglev). == In fiction == === Video games === * Cyberia (1994) * Deus Ex: Human Revolution (2011) * Homefront (2011) === Movies === * Metropolis (1927) * Children of Men (2006) * V For Vendetta (2006) === Television === * A.D. Police Files (1990) * Aqua Teen Hunger Force (2010) * The Ghost Hunter (BBC Children's Drama) (2002) * RahXephon (2002) * Revolution (2012) * Cameron Phillips of Terminator: The Sarah Connor Chronicles is from this year. (2008) * The Whitest Kids U' Know (2009) === Music === * Video set in 2027: Put Your Hands Up 4 Detroit by Fedde Le Grande (2006) === Literature === * In Kim Stanley Robinson's 'Mars Trilogy', the first hundred Human colonists land on Mars this year. == References ==
